desc: We work closely with our jockeys in the UK & abroad to deliver the highest performing horse racing boots on the market, handmade. Welcome to Classic Boots!

layout.text:
At Classic Boots, quality is our mission. We are dedicated to providing you your tailor-made boots combining comfort, value and quality, when you need them.

With over 30 years in experience, we work closely with our jockeys in the UK and abroad to bring you the best and highest performance boots on the market.

Philip Wood
